figure.head: Figure 1:
figure.figDesc:
Occupancy of the THz mode versus pump
intensity in equilibrium state for different temperatures:
1 K (red/solid), 10 K (green/dashed) and 20 K (blue/dash-
dotted). Illustration of the bistability and hysteresis. If T
being increased threshold current also increases.

figure.head: Figure 2:
figure.figDesc:
System response on a short single impuls
(FWHM= 20 ps) for different values of the background
pump: 4600 ps −1 (red), 5750 ps −1 (green) and 6500 ps −1
(blue). Switching occurs only when the background pump
corresponds to the bistable region (compare with Fig. 1).
